feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 11 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow ending early this evening then cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the afternoon then clearing. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain early in the morning. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
